event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Schedule a repair procedure to replace the affected FRU.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: A linkcard installed in an I/O boat is behaving as if it were installed in a host I/O slot.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item:
The Uplink location signal is faulty. This could be a fault in the linkcard or slot-0 in the the boat. It may also indicate a failure of the bridge controller in the uplink card. Follow the steps below to obtain the necessary data for presentation to your authorized service provider.

Step 1: Collect the fault message.
A single line fault message is displayed to the system console and logged in the /var/logs/message file. The complete message may be retrieved by using the 'fmdump' command on the XSCF console as shown below.

Example:

LEGEND:
RED = SUNW-MSG-ID
BLUE = EVENT_ID
GREEN = FRU

 XSCF> fmdump -m
   MSG-ID: IOXSCF-8001-9Y, TYPE: Fault, VER: 1, SEVERITY: Major
   EVENT-TIME: Tue Mar 27 08:37:25 PDT 2007
   PLATFORM: SPARC-Enterprise, CSN: BE80601000, HOSTNAME: server-0
   SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12
   EVENT-ID: c4819b64-3fe2-4fe3-a87a-0f8e0b7a11cb
   DESC: A linkcard installed in an I/O boat is behaving as if it
   were installed in a host I/O slot.
   Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/IOXSCF-8001-9Y for more information.
   AUTO-RESPONSE: No immediate action is taken
   IMPACT: The I/O devices may not be functional and the FRUS
   accessed via the linkcard may not be monitored.
   REC-ACTION: Schedule a repair procedure to replace the affected FRU.

Step 2: Collect the "fmdump" output.
Use the fmdump command with the Event-ID option to retrieve more information on the fault which has occurred.

Example:

 XSCF> fmdump -v -u c4819b64-3fe2-4fe3-a87a-0f8e0b7a11cb
   TIME                 UUID                                 MSG-ID
   Mar 27 08:37:25.6771 c4819b64-3fe2-4fe3-a87a-0f8e0b7a11cb IOXSCF-8001-9Y
       100% fault.chassis.iox.ulc-wrong-mode
       Problem in: hc:///chassis=0/iou=0/pcislot=2/link=0/cable=0
          Affects: -
              FRU: hc://:product-id=SPARC-Enterprise:chassisid=BE80601000:server-id=server-
0/component=/IOU#0/PCI#2/LINK/CABLE

Step 3: Provide the output collected to your service provider.
The information collected above will help your service provider to schedule a repair at your convenience.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
event_registry_properties.item: The I/O devices may not be functional and the FRUS accessed via the linkcard may not be monitored.
event_registry_properties.name: response
title
event_registry_properties.item: External I/O Expansion Unit Linkcard Mode failure
